Package org.digijava.kernel.validation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConstraintValidator
    Validates if the value satisfies one or more constraints.
    ConstraintValidatorContext
    Context object that allows to report custom constraint violations.
    ConstraintValidatorContext.ConstraintViolationBuilder
    Allows to build custom constraint violation.
    Path
    Describes a field path.
    Path.Node
    Describes a field.
    TranslationContext.ContentTranslationLoader  
    TranslationContext.EditorLoader  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConstraintDescriptor
    Describes a single constraint.
    ConstraintDescriptors
    Container for constraint descriptors.
    ConstraintValidatorContextImpl  
    ConstraintViolation
    Describes a constraint violation.
    ContentTranslatedValueContext
    Used for translatable fields tha are persisted in AmpContentTranslation.
    EditorTranslatedValueContext
    Used for fields that are persisted in Editor.
    MultilingualTranslatedValueContext
    Used for fields that are persisted in MultilingualContent.
    NotTranslatedValueContext
    Value context when translations are not applicable.
    PathImpl
    Implementation of field path.
    TranslatedValueContext
    A context object that allows to retrieve the value for a specific language.
    TranslationContext
    This class allows to load values for multilingual fields for validation purposes.
    ValidationContext
    Collects all found constraint violations.
    Validator
    Validator that follows type information from APIField.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConstraintDescriptor.ConstraintTarget
